## OpenAlex versus others  {.extra-small}

|                       | Number of works  | OA works    | Citations | Price        | Data Openness             | Org structure |
| --------------------- | ---------------- | ----------- | --------- | ------------ | ------------------------- | ------------- |
| OpenAlex              | 243M             | 48M         | 1.9B      | Freemium     | Fully open, CC0 license   | Non-profit    |
| Scopus                | 87M              | [20.5M](https://blog.scopus.com/posts/scopus-now-includes-90-million-content-records) | 1.8B      | Subscription | Closed                    | For Profit    |
| Web of Science (core) | 87M              | [12M](https://clarivate.com/webofsciencegroup/solutions/open-access/)   | 1.8B      | Subscription | Closed                    | For Profit    |
| Dimensions            | 135M             | [29M](https://www.dimensions.ai/resources/evaluate-your-universitys-oa-status/)   | 1.7B      | Freemium     | Partly open, personal use | For Profit    |
| Google Scholar        | 389M (estimated) | ?           | ?         | Free         | Closed                    | For Profit    |
| Crossref              | 145M             | 20M         | 1.45B     | Free         | Fully open, CC0 license   | Non-profit    |

## Important points about Search Terms

- Use `AND`, `OR`, `NOT` in capital letters
- Use `"` to search for exact phrases
- Use `(` and `)` to group terms
- Wildcards `*?` are not supported
- Stemming is used, so `fish` will also find `fishing`


# Programmatically (e.g. R)

## Search Terms

::: {.incremental}
- Based on Search Term

----

- Inclusive
- Specificity depend on search terms
:::


## Search Terms

```{r}
#| code-line-numbers: "1|2-10|12-17|"
#| echo: true
#| output-location: column

library(openalexR)
st <- paste0(
    '
    (biodiversity AND "climate change") AND,
    ("ecosystem services" OR "ecosystem functions") AND
    "land use" AND
    conflict AND
    polar
    '
)

openalexR::oa_fetch(
    entity = "works",
    search = st,
    count_only = TRUE,
    verbose = TRUE
)
```


## [Snowball Search](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES_TG_Snowballing/IPBES_TG_Snowballing.html)

::: {.incremental}
- Key Paper
- Identify cited by Key Papers
- Identify citing Key Papers

----

- Specific
- Inclusivity depends on Key Papers
:::


## [Snowball Search](https://ipbes-data.github.io/IPBES_TG_Snowballing/IPBES_TG_Snowballing.html)

```{r}
#| code-line-numbers: "1|2-6|7-11|12-16|"
#| echo: true
#| eval: false

library(openalexR)
dois <- c(
    "10.1016/j.marpol.2023.105710",
    "10.1007/s13280-014-0582-z",
    "10.1016/j.cosust.2022.101160"
)
key_works <- oa_fetch(
    entity = "works",
    doi = dois,
    verbose = TRUE
)
snowball <- oa_snowball(
    identifier = key_works$id,
    verbose = TRUE
)
snowball
```
